TopicTitle: Vagani Car Manufacturers- Get Inspired- Final Challenge

Articles.Content: added names to the original post
Any idea on the third challenge? I don't have school tomorrow so I am looking for things to do in KSP

I decided to bring in the NoS module for this and also for testing.

Going suborbital counts as a jump I guess.

This screenshot is for the Jump and screenshot.

Sorry its a bit late but here is my entry for the second part of the challenge.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

It was also the first time I landed so close to a target.
third challenge will be released tomorrow, dont worry, you can still complete previous challenges even when the next one is released

Ok so the third challenge is to produce a bill board style advert of your car, it must have;

-Your car in it

-The name of your car

-The cost

-Anything that makes it special (EG- My ATORV had 'ready for nature' as its slogon)

Good luck

new challenge out tomorrow, people can do the challenges but you cant win
can you host videos on imgur?

can you host videos on imgur?

No, it's simply an image hoster, witch is btw currently operating at it's limits it seems. With an account for free you can host 250 pictures.

An other soloution would be e.g. filedropper.com, where you can upload files up to 5 GB. But they are deleted after 30 days if you have no premium account (the craft file from my OP will be non existant forinstance).

As i mentioned in my OP:

If you want to check out if s.o. has followed a given path we could use persistant trails. If the distance is not too far away you can see the line in the 3D enviroment, but in map view it is not displayed.
is everybody ok with mediafire, as i may need you to use it for the next challenge
